scripts.build: rimraf dist && webpack --mode=development && npm run report
scripts.report: depcruise --exclude '^node_modules' --output-type dot --prefix 'https://github.com/dragonman225/bmvis/tree/master/' src/index.ts | dot -T svg > report/deps_graph.svg
scripts.upgrade: pnpm i typescript@latest d3@latest eslint@latest dependency-cruiser@latest @typescript-eslint/parser@latest @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin@latest @types/d3@latest --save-exact
